name: Isle of the Crown (Demo)
description:
WHAT TO EXPECT

- A 1v1 Isle to conquer your friends on.

- A small assortment of units that you can use to out-royal your enemies.

- A selection of customizations for your banner on the Isle.

- And of course, the fun of gaining the crown after expunging your rival from the Isle.

A FEW NOTES

Controller-Only:

Due to a planned future feature, controllers are the only current available input that I will allow. Once that additional feature is added in the full game, I will also be adding it here since it uses the current arsenal of cards that will be available to you in this Demo.

No Online:

Due to my limitations as a newer developer, this game does not feature any online play. As much as I wish it did, I can't put it in. But, I am currently trying to see how I can implement it into the game, but networking with games is a very complicated endeavor. So, eventually I will put it in, but I can't say any time soon.

Though, if you get the Free Steam DEMO version, you do get access to its useful "Remote Play Together", which you can use to play with friends on Steam; just so you know. But, if you use Itch's version, you can still enjoy the game with a friend locally; like a game of Chess, Checkers, or any other boardgame.
